content.rendered:
This stylish outdoor rattan set is both hard-wearing and attractive, bringing elegance to the summer days. Comprising of a glass coffee table, two armchairs and one sofa. 

Designed to cope with all weathers and with formidable aluminium skeletons, this is our nod to the luxury resorts of French Polynesia.

The Bora Bora range is virtually maintenance free, comes with a full one year commercial guarantee is the perfect hassle-free solution. 

This item may require self assembly.

Dimensions:

  • Total Sofa Length: 1360mm
  • Total Sofa Depth: 780mm
  • Height for Sofa & Armchairs: 680mm
  • Total Chair Length: 780mm
  • Total Chair Depth: 780mm
  • Table: L:1160mm W:600mm D:440mm
